name: Pyramid Escape (dbelliss, dwarfo, jcheideman)
description:
The fifth game created. Co-created with Thomas Tran and Joshua Heideman. Made the 2 week long game jam (Ancient Civilizations) hosted by the UC Davis Game Development and Arts Club. 3D Potion model by Khang Nguyen.

Recommended to play with a mouse.

Goal:

  • Obtain the treasure and escape the pyramid!

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows keys to move
  • Left click to throw a fire potion (limited ammo)
  • Move the mouse cursor to look around
  • Space to jump
  • Press shift once to crouch, shift again to crawl, and shift again to stand up
  • Right click to activate levers and checkpoints
